test.purpose: Set attribute of a LRE from single attribute set.
Set attributes of a LRE from multiple attribute sets.
Use xsl:element with multiple attribute sets.
Use xsl:copy with multiple attribute sets, no conflicts.
Set attributes of a LRE using attribute sets that inherit.
Test of single attribute value template (AVT).
Test two AVTs with literal element between them (based on example in the spec).
Test of left curly brace escape.
Test of right curly brace escape.
Use of Curly brace to set value of HTML attribute.
Use of Curly brace to set value of HTML attributes. Predicate and quotes inside. Use of Curly brace to set value of HTML attributes. Predicate and quotes inside.
Compare the results of attribute value generated by AVT vs. xsl:value-of, with the output specified to be HTML.
Test for 'self::' Axis Identifier with index (not that it's practical).
Test for 'self::' Axis Identifier with specified element name that is not found.
